    PUREWAX Vacancies Promoter Event (Office Near Klang Parade)

    November 29, 2020

    TOC

    • Job Description
    • Company Overview
    • How To Apply

    PUREWAX is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for Promoter Event (Office Near Klang Parade) position. If you currently looking for new education sector job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

    Job Description

    We are Authorized Dealer By Purewax Malaysia.
    Location : Bukit Tinggi / Setia Alam / Jalan Meru / Shah Alam
    Requirements :
    • SPM, Certificate, Diploma, Degree (Fresh Graduate are welcome)
    • No need experience
    • Able to start immediately (urgent hiring)

    Responsibility
    • Handle event at Shell / Caltex / Petronas / Petron
    • Assist team in promoting & product demonstration at event.
    • Communicate with customers about the event being run.
    • Help supervisor train new employee.
    •  Any duties as required by management.

    Benefits
    • Insurance
    • Bonus per-month
    • Allowance transport
    • Career Development

    CONTACT :Ms. Dira : 0164297721 (Call / Whatsapp)
    https://KLangVacancy.wasap.my
     

    Company Overview

    Our Company Is Authorized Dealer For Purewax Malaysia We Are For Candidates To Join Us Build Their Future Career Together With Us In A Fun Exciting Working Enviroment.

    How To Apply

    If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
    Hope you find your dream education sector job in Klang/Port Klang.
    Apply Online
